headline: Why Analysts Think Northrop Grumman Could Be Undervalued As Its Defense Story Evolves
summary: Northrop Grumman's updated narrative reflects only a modest trim to fair value, with the target easing slightly from about $667.21 to $662.68 per share as analysts fine tune long term assumptions. Despite this small recalibration and a marginally lower discount rate of 7.97 % that acknowledges reduced perceived risk, the underlying story of steady mid single digit growth through 2026 and growing confidence in long duration defense programs remains intact. Stay tuned to see how you can track...
